input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Unlit Dunhill Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
The Dunhill Fir is a full body tree featuring a generous number of branch tips for holding holiday trimmings. It is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy folding metal tree stand is included.

This Dunhill Fir Full Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6 feet tall with a 46 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and feel lifelike.
Designed to look and feel lifelike, this tree is defined by its close attention to detail, featuring hundreds of individually crafted branch tips that make up the wide, full-bodied branches that create space for your lights and ornaments.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Garland 9''
  - Name='Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Costway 6Ft Unlit Hinged Snow Flocked Artificial Pencil Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Artificial Arborvitae Topiary Tree'
  - Name='6ft Full Natural Spruce PVC Foldable Metal Stand Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Christmas Time Winter Wonderland 7.5-ft Slim Green Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Base'
  - Name='Fraser Hill Farm 7.5-Ft. Flocked Silverton Fir Christmas Tree with Multi-Color LED String Lighting'
  - Name='Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 865 Tips The Holiday Aisle'
  - Name='Ophelia & Co. 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Wrought Studio 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Oakridge Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Downswept Iced Artificial Christmas Tree Wood Base'
  - Name='Perfect Holiday 11ft Unlit Natural Green Aspen Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Fraser Grande Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Pencil Northern Balsam Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Both are artificial fir trees, but this is a pencil/slim silhouette and a different fir type, making it moderately relevant, but not very similar in shape or fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 6Ft Unlit Hinged Snow Flocked Artificial Pencil Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and hinged branch feature, but it is a slim pencil tree and snow flocked, differing from the full Dunhill Fir shape and materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle 9ft. Dunhill Fir Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares Dunhill Fir name, branch construction, and lighting features; main differences are height (9ft vs 6ft) and possible other minor design nuances, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Unlit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic unlit artificial tree with no specified fir type or features, so only low relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Durham Pole Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different tree type (Pole Pine), so lower relevancy; also no mention of Dunhill Fir or similar construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Artificial Arborvitae Topiary Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different plant type (Arborvitae), shaped as a topiary, fundamentally different product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: 6ft Full Natural Spruce PVC Foldable Metal Stand Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height, full bodied shape, foldable stand feature, but is a spruce tree instead of fir; materials and construction likely similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Christmas Time Winter Wonderland 7.5-ft Slim Green Artificial Christmas Tree with Metal Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim silhouette and different size, plus no specific fir type mentioned; less similar in form and fullness.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Fraser Hill Farm 7.5-Ft. Flocked Silverton Fir Christmas Tree with Multi-Color LED String Lighting
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar fir type and lighting features, flocked finish differs from unlit standard; height difference but generally quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim silhouette and different fir species, unlit and less full-bodied than Dunhill Fir; moderate but not high relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tall Unlit Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree With Realistic Branches And 865 Tips The Holiday Aisle
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares unlit status and fir type with more tips, but slim shape and different height reduce relevance compared to full Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ophelia & Co. 7' Tall Unlit Slim Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit, slim Douglas fir, thus lower similarity to full-bodied, pre-lit Dunhill Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Wrought Studio 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unlit Douglas Fir of similar height but likely slimmer shape and differing branch construction lowers relevancy moderately.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Alcott Hill 7ft Unlit Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar to other 7ft unlit Douglas firs; unlit and possibly less full, so moderate relevance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Dunhill Fir Slim Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares brand and Dunhill Fir name with similar construction but slim profile differs from full-bodied reference tree; highly relevant but slightly less so than full version.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Oakridge Noble Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir variety (Noble Fir) but similar artificial Christmas tree type; shape and construction likely similar so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Downswept Iced Artificial Christmas Tree Wood Base
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a different design (downswept icing), unspecified fir species; lower relevance to Dunhill Fir full-bodied traditional tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Perfect Holiday 11ft Unlit Natural Green Aspen Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Tall, unlit, and with 'Aspen Fir' not typically a recognized type, larger height; less similar in construction and size.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Fraser Grande Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar brand, tall and full Fraser fir type; differs in fir species and size but shares high-quality construction and full-bodied shape, moderately high relevance.
